answerText: Kickstarter.com[10] One of the coolest kickstarter projects is this one by Palmer Luckey, an attempt at making a low-overhead head mounted display. John Carmack and Gabe Newell have sung the praises of the potential of this device.
heading: Terrapin |2013 | Dartmouth + University of Washington - FINAL | 11 | Trash | None | College
subject: Trash
question: Question: Double Fine Adventure was funded through this website, but an unsuccessful attempt at funding through it was a card game called Tentacle Bento, which satirizes a certain genre of something unsavory. For 10 points each: [10] Identify this website that provides a way of crowd-funding your artistic projects and scientific endeavors.
